DOC.brief_summary: This randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled, parallel and multiple dose study provided safety, preliminary efficacy, and immunogenicity information about the use of BMS-188667 and BMS-224818 in subjects with RA
DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Multiple-Dose LEA29Y vs CTLAG4Ig vs Placebo in Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of RA < 5 years Functional class I, II, or II as defined by the American College of Rheumatology (ACR) criteria. Must have failed at least 1 Disease Modifying AnitRheumatic Drug (DMARD) Joint count of 10 or more swollen and 12 or more tender. Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR) > 28mm/rr or norning stiffness > 45 minutes. Women and men who are not willing to use an accepted form of contraception. Active vasculitis Treatment with another investigational drug within 30 days History of asthma, angioedema, or anaphylaxix
